body:
Clone Wars is back

But what if the only reason Disney is bringing back Clone Wars is because they are using it to create a plot point for Star Wars IX…

tags: I want to paint my D&D figures now
my oil painting skills helping out in the weirdest ways
pleasantly surprised that I didn’t just ruin my bday present
summary: I always wanted to learn how to paint really tiny figurines, so I tried repainting the kylo doll my sister got me for my b-day....
caption: I always wanted to learn how to paint really tiny figurines, so I tried repainting the kylo doll my sister got me for my b-day. it’s not at all perfect, but I’m pleasantly surprised that I didn’t just ruin my present… in fact, it was fun and I learned a lot for a first try. :3

reblog.comment: I always wanted to learn how to paint really tiny figurines, so I tried repainting the kylo doll my sister got me for my b-day. it’s not at all perfect, but I’m pleasantly surprised that I didn’t just ruin my present… in fact, it was fun and I learned a lot for a first try. :3

trail.content_raw: I always wanted to learn how to paint really tiny figurines, so I tried repainting the kylo doll my sister got me for my b-day. it’s not at all perfect, but I’m pleasantly surprised that I didn’t just ruin my present… in fact, it was fun and I learned a lot for a first try. :3
trail.content: I always wanted to learn how to paint really tiny figurines, so I tried repainting the kylo doll my sister got me for my b-day. it’s not at all perfect, but I’m pleasantly surprised that I didn’t just ruin my present… in fact, it was fun and I learned a lot for a first try. :3

summary: haters hating - all the time - everywhere - COULD YOU NOT?
title: haters hating - all the time - everywhere - COULD YOU NOT?
body:
Doctor: so… since when did you feel this pain in your stomach?

Butthurt “Fan”: The Last Jedi was such a shit movie! I hate Rian Johnson. Disney ruined Star Wars. For me, Star Wars is over. Kylo Ren is a pussy. Rey is a Mary Sue! Who is Rose I hate her, fuck her role and her romance with Finn! Nobody needs Finn and Rose! They destroyed Lukes character! None of my headcanons became canon! I will stick to Episode 1-6 and the EU, because this is the real Star Wars. Whoever liked The Last Jedi is a sheep!

FFS - stop complaining about The Last Jedi or at least just talk about it when you’re asked to. Nobody fucking cares about your opinion. It can’t be that every Star Wars Group and Forum is infested with toxic people like that and it’s so tiring. come up with your own hater-groups and tags but it seems you just NEED to try and spoil something for other people.stahp it. it’s been about half a year. calm down at some point.

I will stick to Episode 1-6 and the EU, because this is the real Star Wars. Whoever liked The Last Jedi is a sheep!

FFS - stop complaining about The Last Jedi or at least just talk about it when you’re asked to. Nobody fucking cares about your opinion. It can’t be that every Star Wars Group and Forum is infested with toxic people like that and it’s so tiring. come up with your own hater-groups and tags but it seems you just NEED to try and spoil something for other people.stahp it. it’s been about half a year. calm down at some point.

tags: quinlan gets dragged into everyone's affairs
Order 66 never happened what are you talking about???
summary: Star Wars and oh look - more Obitine.
body:
Star Wars and oh look - more Obitine.

Surprised?

No you’re not.

Moving on!

If we’re going with the theory that Korkie is Obitine’s love-child, I had a hilarious thought.

In a universe where Order 66 never happened and Obitine just kind of went “f it, let’s see what happens,” the Galaxy awaits in anticipation to see what this super blonde child is like. Force Sensitive? Bringer of peace? Like his Aunt Bo-Katan, preferring Mandalorian traditions as opposed to his parents ideals?

Given who his parents are, and his upbringing, he can be the most formal, polite kid there is. Madame, sir, your grace, please, thank you, pardon, holds open elevator doors, etc.

Therefore, I can completely imagine Korkie having the most foul mouth when provoked, having a solid right-hook (if he had to resort to violence), and calling Obi-Wan “Pops.”

It’s revealed during a failed negotiation - where Obi-Wan brings Korkie and the former is knocked out - that Korkie knows how to weild a lightsaber and can use the Force as good, if not better, than the Chosen One. Obi-Wan has been training him for years.

The Jedi Order is mildly horrified that this stubborn teenager, heir to the Mandalorian throne, has been flying under their radar for years.

Mace takes a shot everytime the kid is around him.

Ghost Qui-Gon high-fives him.

Yoda just shakes his head and sighs.

Anakin is thrilled. “You guys did it? Without telling me?!? Poodoo, Obi-Wan! I owe Quinlan ten credits!”

The Mandalorians give up on trying to force Satine off the throne. There’s no use fighting the power couple of the Galaxy. Their combined sass is terrifying enough.

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

blog.name: kylo-rey
blog.title: you're not alone
blog.description:
REY AND KYLO CAN KICK MY ASS

andea’s reylo sideblog • #userandea

prev. dailykylorey and reybens

summary:
it still amazes me how human disaster kylo ren kept on fucking up after meeting rey
it all started when he was supposed to...
body:
it still amazes me how human disaster kylo ren kept on fucking up after meeting rey

  • it all started when he was supposed to retrieve a droid, but he bridal-carried an unknown scavenger girl instead.
  • he was supposed to interrogate her and get resistance information for the first order, but he focused on “something there, of interest. not the image of the map. that would take another moment. but definitely something worth investigating” and then proceeding to get his mental ass kicked by her instead.
  • he was supposed to bring the resistance information and the map to skywalker to supreme leader snoke, but he proceeded to brag about how powerful his crush was instead.
  • then snoke called him out on his shit and told him that he had “compassion for her”. he denied it, but nobody (including himself) bought it.
  • he was tasked to bring her to snoke, but since he took so long talking about her, she was able to slip away.
  • since he was trained by both luke skywalker and snoke, you’d think he’d be able to beat her during their duel, right? wrong. given, he was shot by chewbacca, but if he had wanted to kill her, he would have pushed her off the cliff just like that. he could have actually been as brutal as he was with finn. but no, he wanted her to join him instead and be his apprentice. which led to him losing the battle. and getting his ass kicked. and getting his face sliced. and getting his heart broken.
  • the first time they see each other through the force, you’d think he’d be mad at her, right? for beating him and slicing his pretty face and breaking his heart on starkiller base? nah, he was giving her the heart eyes instead. it’s like he was so intrigued as to why the force would connect them. dare i say, it gave him hope?
  • throughout their force skypes, he proceeded to be softer and gentler with her. i mean, we all expected a hot-headed, tantrum throwing kylo, right?
  • nope.
  • she told him he was a monster and he was like. yeah. and then he got wet. literally.
  • then he flashed her with his tiddies.
  • and then he told her that she wasn’t alone.
  • and then they touched hands. how soft was that? the “cold-blooded asshole murderer” had tears in his eyes while touching hands. with her. his enemy. his equal. the only one who could actually beat him force-wise. the love of his life.
  • oh my god
  • and then she shipped herself to save him. you’d think they’d be all serious with each other, right? nope. he smiled when he saw her. they also both made stormtroopers uncomfortable by flirting with each other. great.
  • and then she called him “ben”. based on what we’ve all seen and read, he gets mad when people call him that. it’s even illegal to say his name in the first order. but instead of being mad, he looked lost. he didn’t even throw a fit. and then they proceeded to eye fuck on the elevator while talking about the futures they’ve both seen with each other.
  • you’d think after all this time of seeking praise from his master, he would be pleased that snoke’s faith in him was restored after bringing rey.
  • nope.
  • then snoke had revealed that he was the one to bridge kylo and rey’s minds together. asshole.
  • “kylo ren had remained kneeling in the throne room as snoke tormented rey, his face an impassive mask. now he looked up in surprise, his eyes locked on his master. snoke ignored the pleading look on kylo’s face—just as he ignored the sickly waves of pain and confusion that rolled out from him into the force.”
  • he didn’t have the strength to look at rey while snoke actually tortured her for information.
  • it actually gives us a comparison of how gentle he was with her in tfa. but are you kidding me, he actually always has been gentle and soft with her? in terms of his character because he’s an asshole and he’s a villain. he’s a beast when you compare his interactions with everyone else, but with rey? he’s actually less of an asshole. which is weird because, again, they’re enemies. kylo fucked that up too because of her.
  • then he was tasked by his master to kill her to fulfill his destiny. but guess what, though?
  • HE KILLED HIS MASTER INSTEAD
  • he killed his master to save her!!!!! the creature who had been manipulating his mind since he was a child???? he craved guidance and praise from snoke and yet he killed him after asking kylo to kill his rey????? oh my GOD
  • as kylo ren, that was actually the biggest fuck up of all.
  • as ben solo though, the biggest fuckup comes after they’ve fought the praetorian guards.
  • wasn’t it obvious to both of them that they both just wanted to be with each other?
  • but goddamn it, of course she wanted to save her friends and not rule the galaxy with him??? she’s not evil. or dumb.
  • also, why would you call her “nothing”, ben? sure, she isn’t nothing to you, but that was really dumb.
  • and then he decided to be the supreme leader after she had left him. way to fix a broken heart, kylo.
  • of course, after wanting to kill the resistance and lowkey betraying her, she’s mad at him.
  • and after she closed the falcon’s door on him, he knew that he really fucked up this time.

reblog.comment:
it still amazes me how human disaster kylo ren kept on fucking up after meeting rey

  • it all started when he was supposed to retrieve a droid, but he bridal-carried an unknown scavenger girl instead.
  • he was supposed to interrogate her and get resistance information for the first order, but he focused on “something there, of interest. not the image of the map. that would take another moment. but definitely something worth investigating” and then proceeding to get his mental ass kicked by her instead.
  • he was supposed to bring the resistance information and the map to skywalker to supreme leader snoke, but he proceeded to brag about how powerful his crush was instead.
  • then snoke called him out on his shit and told him that he had “compassion for her”. he denied it, but nobody (including himself) bought it.
  • he was tasked to bring her to snoke, but since he took so long talking about her, she was able to slip away.
  • since he was trained by both luke skywalker and snoke, you’d think he’d be able to beat her during their duel, right? wrong. given, he was shot by chewbacca, but if he had wanted to kill her, he would have pushed her off the cliff just like that. he could have actually been as brutal as he was with finn. but no, he wanted her to join him instead and be his apprentice. which led to him losing the battle. and getting his ass kicked. and getting his face sliced. and getting his heart broken.
  • the first time they see each other through the force, you’d think he’d be mad at her, right? for beating him and slicing his pretty face and breaking his heart on starkiller base? nah, he was giving her the heart eyes instead. it’s like he was so intrigued as to why the force would connect them. dare i say, it gave him hope?
  • throughout their force skypes, he proceeded to be softer and gentler with her. i mean, we all expected a hot-headed, tantrum throwing kylo, right?
  • nope.
  • she told him he was a monster and he was like. yeah. and then he got wet. literally.

summary:
Rey: I bet I could fit the whole galaxy in my hands! 
Finn: I’m sorry, Rey, but that’s physically impossible-
Rey, cupping...
body:
Rey: I bet I could fit the whole galaxy in my hands!

Finn: I’m sorry, Rey, but that’s physically impossible-

Rey, cupping Finn’s face in her hands: Are you sure?

Finn, blushing: Stop, I have a reputation.

reblog.comment:

summary:
Rey: Tall people are the enemy.
Kylo: I can’t even see you hating down there.
Rey: I will tie your fucking shoelaces together...
body:
Rey: Tall people are the enemy.

Kylo: I can’t even see you hating down there.

Rey: I will tie your fucking shoelaces together and you won’t even know ‘til it’s too late.
